meta.title: Meshhouse - free 3D models for commercial use

slide-1.title: Free 3D models
slide-1.description: Also for commercial use, with fair restrictions. We provide models in several formats.

slide-2.title: PBR-Ready materials
slide-2.description: Each model has materials, based on PBR principals. This models are compatible with models game engines and offline-renders (Vray, Arnold, Redshift, Renderman).

slide-3.title: 4K+ PBR-Ready textures
slide-3.description: By using modern pipeline, we provide PBR-Ready textures, average at 4K resolution. In some cases we using UDIM-unwrapping.

readytouse.title: Ready to use models
readytouse.text: In order to use our models, you don't need to put in a lot of effort to clear unnecessary objects from the scene. Just download the model in the required format, download the textures (if necessary), and insert into the scene.
readytouse.note: Some models should be adapted to your model, such as clothing.

free.title: Completely free
free.text: All models distributed on our website are completely free. Including for commercial use (films, games, etc.)

opensource.title: Open source
opensource.text: We provide sources of this site and also sources of our application in our GitHub repository. This means that anyone can check for tracking scripts and other backdoors.

programs.title: We provide models in next formats
programs.note: Some models can be presented only in one of the presented formats - this is due to the fact that the models are laid out gradually, as well as the need to convert between formats.
